short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small tool to sort A1QUA accounts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small tool to sort A1QUA accounts. 

In A1QUA, the order of accounts is determined by when they are added.
After installing the extension, the order will be sorted by alphabetically.

Besides, you can also add some accounts as favorites so that you can find it quickly.
